channel.title: Can some1 make these code for me cuz i am a noob
channel.description:
i would like you to make these experiance codes plz i use testscape
combat: 8 xp for every hit per one hit
health: 3 xp for every hit per one damage
range: 12 xp for every hit per one damage
mage: add 7 xp to everything
mineing: add 17 xp per ore/ess
smithing: 20xp per bronze, 40 per iorn bar, 60 for steel bar, 75 for mith bar, 100 per addy, 200 per rune bar, and then add like 5 xp to everything u can make with the bars
fleaching: can stay the same
runecrafting: add double xp for wut ever runescpae has it set for
fishing and cooking: can stay the same
wood cutting: trees 40 xp, oak 60 xp, willows 80 xp, teak 100 xp, mapple 120 xp, mahogany 135 xp, yew 200 xp, magic 300 xp
dragon axe: requiared lvl 61 ty
farming: double everything that runescape has
crafting double everything for crafting
everything else can stay the same
send them to my email address masiveking@aol.com ty :D
